code: import{Button}from'antd';import React,{useState}from'react';import BookingTableAddModal from'./booking-table-add-modal';import{useTranslation}from'react-i18next';import{shallowEqual,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookingFooter=()=>{const{t}=useTranslation();const[tableAdd,setTableAdd]=useState(null);const{statistics}=useSelector(state=>state.bookingTable,shallowEqual);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("footer",{className:"booking_footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"booking_footer_statics",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:t('table')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"booking_text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"booking_circle",style:{background:'red'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[t('available')," : ",statistics.available]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"booking_text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"booking_circle",style:{background:'green'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[t('booked')," : ",statistics.booked]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"booking_text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"booking_circle",style:{background:'yellow'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[t('occupied')," : ",statistics.occupied]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"booking_footer_add_table mr-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"primary",size:"small",onClick:()=>setTableAdd(true),children:t('add.table')})}),tableAdd&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BookingTableAddModal,{visible:tableAdd,handleCancel:()=>setTableAdd(null)})]});};export default BookingFooter;
